name: Flash taskbar icon — Windows & Linux ONLY

customFields.Update notes: 5/11/2022 Jelena: functionality changed only taskbar icon will flash on Windows, app window will no longer flash

inline.description:
1. Perform a fresh desktop app install 
  2. Navigate to settings:
    Windows: File ➜ Settings (CTRL+,)
    Linux: File ➜ Settings (CTRL+,)
inline.expectedResult: • Verify "Flash taskbar icon when a new message is received If enabled, the taskbar icon will flash for a few seconds when a new message is received."  should be selected/checked on new installs by default.

inline.description:
1. Go to [channel1] and set channel "Notification Preferences > Send desktop notifications" to "Only for mentions"
  2. As a different user post on [channel1]
inline.expectedResult: • No desktop notification sent, taskbar icon doesn't flash.

inline.description:
1. Go to [channel2] and set channel "Notification Preferences ➜ Send desktop notifications" to "For all activity"
  2. Use another test account on a web browser to send a message in [channel1] and [channel2] without mentioning the user.
inline.expectedResult: • Desktop notification sent, taskbar icon flashes, then remains highlighted until the user has opened the app window.
